_quizTitle.comment: Quiz Title used as placeholder in creation view
_quizDescription.comment: Quiz Description used as placeholder in creation view
_enterTheQuestion.comment: Enter the question used as placeholder in creation view
_option.comment: Enter your choice 1 next parameter will be string used in creation view
_dueIn.comment: Due in {1 week, }{Correct answer shown after every question}
_addMoreOptions.comment: Add more options button used in creation view
_invalidFileFormat.comment: Invalid file format error message in creation view
_addQuestion.comment: Add Question button to add new question section
_resultMe.comment: Results visible to only me text
correctAnswer: {0} Correct answer shown after every question
_correctAnswer.comment: {,} Correct answer shown after every question. Adding comma as seperator before
invalidDateTime: Alert! Invalid Date or Time. It must be greater than current date and time.
_invalidDateTime.comment: Error message if due by is less than current date and time
sureDeleteThis: Are you sure you want to delete?
_sureDeleteThis.comment: Confirm message to delete the section
forQuizAtleastOneQuestion: At least one question is required
_forQuizAtleastOneQuestion.comment: Error message if user try to delete one and only one question in the quiz
maxTenOption: Maximum 10 options allowed for a Question
_maxTenOption.comment: Error message if more that 10 options added
atLeastTwoOptionsRequired: At least two options are required
_atLeastTwoOptionsRequired.comment: Error message if user delete 2 options
_questionLeftBlank.comment: Error message when question is left blank
selectCorrectChoice: Please select correct choice for the question
_selectCorrectChoice.comment: Error message when checkbox is not selected
showCorrectAnswer: Show correct answer after each question
_showCorrectAnswer.comment: Show correct answer after each question text
answerCannotChange: Answer cannot be changed if this option is selected
_answerCannotChange.comment: Answer cannot be changed if this option is selected label
question: Question
_question_numbers.comment: Questions: 5. Param1 contains string to show number of questions in response view
_totalQuestionQuiz.comment: Total 5 Questions/Question in the Quiz. Param1 contains the number of question in quiz and Param2 contains Question/Questions String
alreadyTired: Note - You have already taken this quiz!
_alreadyTired.comment: Note - You have already taken this quiz! text
notConsideredFinalScore: You can reattempt this quiz for practice. Your score for this attempt wouldn't be considered against the final score.
_notConsideredFinalScore.comment: You can reattempt this quiz for practice. Your score for this attempt wouldn't be considered against the final score. text
_xofy.comment: 2 of 5. In pagination Param1: Shows Current questionn attempting. Param2 contains total number of question in quiz
choose_any_choice: Please respond before moving to next question
_choose_any_choice.comment: Please choose any an option for a question Error Message
_participation.comment: Participation 25%. Param1: contains the number of percentage
_xofy_people_responded.comment: 2 of 8 people responded. Param1: contains number of responders, Param2: contains total number of participants
_you_yet_respond.comment: You are yet to respond text in summary view
be_the_first_one_to_respond: Be the first one to take the quiz
_be_the_first_one_to_respond.comment: Be the first one to take the quiz text
_one_responded.comment: UserA responded. Param1: Contains responder name as a string
_two_responded.comment: UserA and UserB responded. Param1: Contains first responder name as a string. Param2: Contains second responder nameas a string
_three_responded.comment: UserA, USerB and UserC responded. Param1: Contains first responder name as a string. Param2: Contains second responder nameas a string. Param3: Contains third responder nameas a string
_three_and_one_other_responded.comment: UserA, USerB, UserC and 1 other responded. Param1: Contains first responder name as a string. Param2: Contains second responder nameas a string. Param3: Contains third responder nameas a string
_three_and_others_responded.comment: UserA, USerB, UserC and 5 other responded. Param1: Contains first responder name as a string. Param2: Contains second responder nameas a string. Param3: Contains third responder nameas a string, Param4: total number of responder excluding 3
_due_by_date.comment: Due by 22 Oct, 2020 11:20AM. Param1: Date time as string
_result_creator.comment: Results visible to sender/myself only text
_changeDueBy.comment: Change Due By label on result view
closeQuizConfirm: Are you sure you want to close this Quiz?
_closeQuizConfirm.comment: Are you sure you want to close this Quiz? Confirm box for Summary View
deleteQuizConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Quiz?
_deleteQuizConfirm.comment: Are you sure you want to delete this Quiz? Confirm box for Summary View
_changeDueDate.comment: Change due date label in summary view
_nWeek.comment: {1} week string for footer setting area
_hours.comment: hour string for footer setting area

_minutes.comment: minutes string for footer setting area
_minute.comment: minute string for footer setting area
_days.comment: days string for footer setting area

$manifest.name: Quiz
$manifest.activities.activityTypes[2].de: Daily digest of quiz response status
$manifest.msTeamsProps.description.full: Create a quiz to test people's knowledge in a chat or channel. Find the app in 'â€¦' under the message compose box. Provide title and create a questionnaire to post in you chat or channel. Find responses and aggregated summary for quick evaluation.
